characters.name: The Cowboy
characters.appearance: Tall man with black hair, weathered face. Wears a tan cowboy hat, white undershirt beneath a blue coat, and typical Old West gunslinger attire with a gun belt and boots. Has a distinctive X-shaped scar on his arm.
characters.personality: Tough, stoic, and morally ambiguous. A man haunted by his past, driven by a sense of justice for his wife's infidelity.
characters.role: The protagonist of the showdown. A man who murdered his wife's lover and now faces the law.

characters.name: The Sheriff
characters.appearance: Stereotypical Old West sheriff with a visible badge, standard sheriff's outfit and hat. Nondescript but authoritative appearance.
characters.personality: Righteous and by-the-book. Dedicated to upholding the law.
characters.role: The antagonist. Pursues the cowboy for the murder and confronts him in the saloon.

storyline.overview: A tense showdown in a dusty Old West saloon between a morally ambiguous cowboy who murdered his wife's lover and the righteous sheriff pursuing him. The confrontation ends with the cowboy killing the sheriff, leaving him standing in shock amid the chaos of the saloon.
storyline.tone: Bittersweet, dramatic. A classic Western showdown with moral complexity and tragic undertones.
scenes: Establishing shot of the dusty saloon filled with bartender and bystanders
The sheriff walks through the doors, spotting the cowboy
Tense standoff between the two men - hands hovering over gun belts
The cowboy draws and fires faster than the sheriff
The cowboy stands in shock, gun smoking, surrounded by frozen onlookers
Final moment: the cowboy's haunted expression as the weight of his actions settles in
